name: S3Upload
description: Build task to upload a file to S3 bucket in AWS.
author: Marcus Felling

inputs.name: BucketName
inputs.label: Bucket Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the S3 Bucket

inputs.name: File
inputs.label: File(s) to upload
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to file(s) or folder. For multiple files, use comma delimited list (no spaces). **Mutiple Files Example:** $(Build.SourcesDirectory)/examplefile1.txt,$(Build.SourcesDirectory)/examplefile1.txt **Folder Example:** $(Build.ArtifactsStagingDirectory)/ExampleFolder/

inputs.name: Key
inputs.label: Name of S3 Object(s) (Key)
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name and directory that the corresponding file(s) will have in Amazon S3. **This field must be empty if uploading folder**; File names will be the same as local. For multiple files, use comma delimited list (no spaces). **Example:** S3FolderName/examplefile1-uploaded.txt,S3FolderName/examplefile2-uploaded.txt
